snippet.title: indy800 with drones (fpga)
snippet.description:
As per request - applying Atari's "computer controlled car logic" to the Indy 800 game. The logic was never applied to Indy800 but used in the Sprint 2 game, which uses a 6502 CPU. For indy800 (which is TTL only) i have copied the logic into fpga (overlaying the players logic) and created a vector play field (which guide the drones) specifically for indy 800's track layout .

The demo only features 4 cars, but can easily be extended to cover all 8 cars.
